scripts.build: npm run build -w common && npm run build --workspaces --if-present
scripts.build:cli: npm run build -w common && npm run build -w wb
scripts.build:daemon: npm run build -w common && npm run build -w wbd
scripts.install:bins: npm run build && npm link -w wb && npm link -w wbd
scripts.uninstall:bins: npm unlink -w wb && npm unlink -w wbd
scripts.clean: rm -rf common/dist wb/dist wbd/dist node_modules common/node_modules wb/node_modules wbd/node_modules
